電話號碼已存在, 請勿重複註冊: This phone number has already been registered; please do not register the same number twice.
請輸入英文或數字 8-16 位數: Please enter English or numbers 8-16 characters
網路異常, 請再嘗試一次: Internet not responding, please try again
請選擇電話國碼: Please select your phone's country code
驗證碼已發送至您的手機: A confirmation code has been sent to your phone
網路異常, 請重新嘗試: Internet not responding, please try again
註冊成功, 請按登入按鈕進行登入: Registration complete. Please log in via the log-in button
找不到可用的 QRcode，請再試一次: Cannot find available QR code, please try again
請輸入發送至您指定手機門號之簡訊驗證碼: Please enter the confirmation code sent to your phone number via SMS
請輸入與銀行卡相同之真實姓名以確保您的權益: Please enter the name on your bank card to protect your rights
請先輸入手機號碼，與完成相關檢查: Please enter your mobile phone number and complete the relevant checks.
註冊成功，確認後返回登入頁進行登入: Registration successful. Please confirm and return to the login page to log in.
電話號碼已存在，請勿重複註冊: Phone number already exists. Please do not register again.
找不到可用的 QRcode，請重新確認: No available QR code found. Please recheck.
帳號含有限制開頭BMH，請使用其他帳號，如有疑問請聯繫客服。: Account starts with restricted characters BMH. Please use a different account. If you have questions, please contact customer service.
